item.title: Juli add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "When his life was ruined, his family killed, his farm destroyed, Job knelt down on the ground and yelled up to the heavens, "Why god? Why me?" and the thundering voice of God answered, There's just something about you that pisses me off." -- Stephen King

item.title: Juli add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Juli add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Juli add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Juli add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description: "Its our actions that define us. What we choose. What we resist. What we're willing to die for." -- Karen Marie Moning

item.title: Juli add a quote by Karen Moning
item.description: "It's just that in the Deep South, women learn at a young age that when the world is falling apart around you, it's time to take down the drapes and make a new dress." -- Karen Moning

item.title: Juli add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "If I die, I will wait for you, do you understand? No matter how long. I will watch from beyond to make sure you live every year you have to its fullest, and then we’ll have so much to talk about when I see you again… (Bones)" -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Juli add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "Movies. Drinks. Headless chickens. You know, girl stuff. " -- Jeaniene Frost
